title: E-reader tech working around book bans.
content: Libraries can fight censorship by issuing free electronic membership cards.

title: Conservative Activist or Terrorist? Using tech for evil.
content: What is the difference between an activist and a terrorist who uses social media technology to monitor, stalk, harass, or spread lies about teachers and librarians who believe banning books to be detrimental to society as a whole? Some say there is no difference.

title: How to use technology to make reading fun.
content: Individuals have accessed the power of influence by utilizing services like Goodreads, or social media sites such as FaceBook and TikTok to change the perception of reading as well as what we want to read.
